mapper.update: update user_role set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify = #{modify,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, code, version, modify, modify_time from user_role
